name: Dumb & Dead
description:
Dumb & Dead is a minimalistic puzzle-platformer game with simple physics interactions where you have to exploit your enemies' stupidity to win. Lure them into traps, make them kill each other, have them break crates and jump on top of each other to use them as a lift, and find the key to open the door.

The game is still in its early stages: sound effects and soundtrack are to be added shortly. New levels will be released at least once a month.

Get it for free or donate. If you would like to donate, you will help the making of the game and you will be able to download all further updates for free. Enjoy!

Controls:

  • WASD to move, Space to jump
  • R to retry the level

Features:

  • Current levels: 5
  • Animations: to come this summer
  • Sound: to come this summer
